mapper.sql: ROLEID, MENUID, ROLENAME, MAKEDATE, MAKEUSER, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYUSER
mapper.insert: insert into cms_rolemenu (ROLEID, MENUID, ROLENAME, MAKEDATE, MAKEUSER, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYUSER) values (#{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{makedate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{makeuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{modifydate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cms_rolemenu
ROLEID,
MENUID,
ROLENAME,
MAKEDATE,
MAKEUSER,
MODIFYDATE,
MODIFYUSER,
#{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update cms_rolemenu
ROLENAME = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAKEDATE = #{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MAKEUSER = #{makeuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ROLEID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and MENUID = #{menuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
